snippet: President Obama plans to return part of his salary in solidarity with federal workers who are going to be furloughed as part of automatic budget cuts, an official said Wednesday.
abstract: President Obama plans to return 5 percent of his salary to Treasury in solidarity with federal workers who are going to be furloughed as part of automatic budget cuts.

byline.original: By PETER BAKER and MICHAEL D. SHEAR
byline.contributor: Peter Baker reported from Washington, and Michael D. Shear from Denver.

lead_paragraph: President Obama plans to return part of his salary in solidarity with federal workers who are going to be furloughed as part of automatic budget cuts, an official said Wednesday.

headline.seo: In a Budget Gesture, Obama Will Return 5% of His Salary
headline.main: In a Budget Gesture, Obama Will Return 5% of His Salary
headline.print_headline: Obama Will Return 5% of Salary in Budget Gesture
